title: Giant Shrew
description: Brown-furred, mole-like, insectivores with long snouts. Dwell underground; skilled burrowers.
extras: Initiative: Always win initiative in the round of their first attack. +1 to initiative in the round of their second attack.	Ferocity: Attack targets’ heads. Targets with 3 HD or less must save versus death or flee.	Climbing: Skilled climbers; can jump up to 5’.	Territorial: Ferociously defend their hunting area from all intruders.	Echolocation: Perceive their surroundings up to 60’. Unaffected by lack of light. If unable to hear (e.g. silence, 15’ radius): AC reduced to 8 [11], –4 penalty to attacks.
